s.text: The flavor will be strong or dull or salty.
Whatever you do, never serve caviar with chopped egg or onion or capers, and use lemon sparingly if at all.
Eric Ripert of Le Bernardin has been serving it for the past five years.
Home freezers, which are much colder, are not recommended.

Or, to enliven an otherwise slow afternoon, you might remove the upper third of an eggshell, deposit the raw egg in a small pitcher or juice glass, and scramble it under the steam nozzle of an espresso machine.

The following summer another of his customers, who owns one of France's great first-growth vineyards, invited him to Bordeaux, and it was there that Mitchell decided on the career in fine food that would eventually lead him to re-establish Browne Trading, the family business that, for generations, had been selling caviar, fish, and other seafood from the mouth of the Kennebec.
